snippet: FIFA is believed to be investigating members of the Canadian women’s soccer team; Mexico and Brazil advanced to the men’s soccer final; the U.S. will face Spain in the women’s water polo final.
abstract: Olympics Roundup; FIFA is believed to be investigating members of the Canadian women's soccer team after the controversial conclusion to semifinal match between Canada and the United States; other Olympics items noted.
lead_paragraph: FIFA is believed to be investigating members of the Canadian women’s soccer team; Mexico and Brazil advanced to the men’s soccer final; the U.S. will face Spain in the women’s water polo final.

headline.seo: U.S.-Canada Women’s Soccer Match Draws Investigation
